data.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas - Season 7, Ep. 2 - Drunk in Love - Full Episode
data.meta_description: Karen stresses over financing her new salon, Fatima gets Danni to reconsider therapy at the ladies' boozy brunch, Sabrina and Rich don't see eye-to-eye, and Gary gets a wake-up call at work.
